description: This table contains the language fluency level that a member has.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the coverage record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: MEM_LANG_FLUENCY_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indication of how fluent the member is in the language specified in Member Language


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Speaking


Writing


Reading


Native


Unknown
